Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Yithi: “Mna ndicebisa (into) enye kuphela (kuni), okokuba phakamani nimele uAllâh, (nifune inyaniso) ningambini, okanye ningamnye, nize nicamngcisise. “Akukho kuphambana kugxa wenu. (uMuhammad) Yena nguMlumkisi kuni kuphela phambi kwesohlwayo esibuhlungu
Yithi: “Nayiphi na intlawulo endinokuba ndayibiza kuni, yeyenu. Eyam intlawulo ikuAllâh kuphela yaye Yena UliNgqina ngaphezu kwezinto zonke.”
Yithi: “Inene iNkosi yam Idandalazisa inyaniso, nguMazi wokungabonwayo.”
Yithi: “Inyaniso ifikile yaye ubuxoki abukwazi kuqala nto bungakwazi nokuyiphinda na kakade.”
Yithi: “Ukuba ndingolahlekileyo, ndiya kuba ndilahleke ngokuchasene nesiqu sam, kodwa ukuba ndingokhokelelekileyo kuya kuba kungenxa yoko iNkosi yam Ikutyhila kum, inene Yona nguSokuva Okufutshane
Akwaba ubunokukhe ubone xa besoyika kodwa akuyi kubakho (ndlela) yakuphuncula, yaye baza kuhlaselwa kwindawo ekufutshane.”
Baze bathi: “Siyakholwa kuyo (i’Kur’ân) kodwa oko kuya kwamkelwa njani kubo kwindawo ekude kangako
Kaloku baya abakholwa kuyo kwangaphambili, behlasela okungabonwayo bekwindawo ekude

Kananjalo kuya kubekwa umsantsa phakathi kwabo noko bakunqwenelayo, njengoko kwakwenziwe kwabanjengabo ngaphambili. Inene babenentandabuzo engenambaliso (bephika ukholo). Sûrah 35. Al-Fâtir (UMyili wendalo) 35. Egameni lika-Allâh, uSolubabalo, uSozinceba
